page.title: 29FRC Depot
page.content:
The FRC depot is still in Carnock Road. The workforce numbers 130 now and includes office staff, roadworkers, mechanics and drivers. The main jobs undertaken by staff include road and footway repairs, drainage, street lighting, safety fencing, road lining and winter gritting. In winter the gritters can be called out 24 hours a day to clear the snow and grit the roads to make them less icy. There are 11 gritters for West Fife and the depot holds 7,000 tonnes of salt.
Milesmark Primary School
